response.original_title: Βαρβαρική Κληρονομιά: Μια ιστορία για την κατάληψη Villa Βαρβάρα και το κίνημα της Θεσσαλονίκης στα 90ς
response.overview: The self-organized – anti-commercial documentary Barbarian Heritage is an attempt to record a story about the occupation of Villa Varvara and the movement of Thessaloniki in the 90s. Its creation was based on 17 interviews with comrades who were active in the movement at that time and on research on the corresponding archival material (videos, photos, posters, texts, publications). Its goal is to share tools for research and recording history with the movement and to motivate similar attempts in the future.
response.tagline: A story about the occupation of Villa Varvara and the movement of Thessaloniki in the 90s
response.title: Barbarian Heritage
